name: Awesome Chess
description:
Simple open source chess game built with the LÖVE game engine.

Löve2D is required to start the game.

Features

  • Player vs. player
  • Player vs. AI (currently multiple simple AI's are implemented)
  • Special moves/features implemented:
    • En passant
    • Castling
    • Pawn promotion

Contributions, bugs, etc

https://github.com/xiroV/awesome-chess
